Name: Battle Imagine - Eye King
Description:
Activates or advances the Battle Imagine skill of the Eye King - Arcane! Assault Turret.

Arcane! Assault Turret
Summons Elite - Inspecting Floating Eye to continuously shoot at the target, dealing Attack Damage.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
